property.code:
{{velocity}} #### Controller ##### #if("$!request.action" == "") #view() #elseif("$!request.action" == "rename") #rename() #elseif("$!request.action" == "renameForm") #renameForm() #elseif("$!request.action" == "delete") #delete() #elseif("$!request.action" == "add") #add() #elseif("$!request.action" == "export") #export() #end #### ADD #### #macro(add) #set($value = "$!request.value") #set($document = $xwiki.getDocument($value)) #if($document.isNew()) $value $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.not_a_document') #view() #else #set($obj = $doc.newObject('Macros.SavedListExporterApplicationClass')) #set($discard = $obj.set('document', $value)) #set($discard = $doc.save()) #if("$!request.ajax"=="1") OK #else $response.sendRedirect("${doc.getURL('view')}#export_form") #end #end #end #### DELETE #### #macro(delete) #set($objectNumber = "$!request.obj") #set($objNumber = $util.parseInt($objectNumber)) #set($obj = $doc.getObject('Macros.SavedListExporterApplicationClass', $objNumber)) #if("$!request.confirm" == "1") #set($discard = $doc.removeObject($obj)) #set($discard = $doc.save()) #if("$!request.ajax"=="1") OK #else $response.sendRedirect($doc.getURL('view')) #end #else $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.confirmremove') **$obj.get('document')** ? {{html}}$msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.confirm.yes') | $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.confirm.no'){{/html}} #end #end #### RENAME FORM #### #macro(renameForm) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Macros.SavedListExporterApplication')) #set($objectNumber = "$!request.obj") #set($objNumber = $util.parseInt($objectNumber)) #set($obj = $doc.getObject('Macros.SavedListExporterApplicationClass', $objNumber)) **$msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.rename')** "$obj.get('document')" {{html}}
{{/html}} #end #### RENAME #### #macro(rename) #set($value = "$!request.value") #set($document = $xwiki.getDocument($value)) #if($document.isNew()) **$value** $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.not_a_document') #renameForm() #else #set($objectNumber = "$!request.obj") #set($objNumber = $util.parseInt($objectNumber)) #set($obj = $doc.getObject('Macros.SavedListExporterApplicationClass', $objNumber)) #set($discard = $obj.set('document', $value)) #set($discard = $doc.save()) #if("$!request.ajax"=="1") OK #else $response.sendRedirect($doc.getURL('view')) #end #end #end #### VIEW #### #macro(view) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('Macros.SavedListExporterApplication')) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Macros.SavedListExporterApplication')) = $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.table.title') = {{html wiki="true"}} #set($objs = $doc.getObjects('Macros.SavedListExporterApplicationClass')) #foreach($obj in $objs) #end
$obj.get('document') $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.btrename') $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.btremove')

= $msg.get('sl_export_app.messages.export.title') =

{{/html}} #end #### EXPORT #### #macro(export) #set($export = $xwiki.package) #set($discard = $export.setWithVersions(false)) #if($request.filename) #set($discard = $export.setName("$request.filename")) #else #set($discard = $export.setName("$doc.getFullName()-sl_export_app")) #end #set($objs = $doc.getObjects('Macros.SavedListExporterApplicationClass')) #foreach($obj in $objs) #set($discard = $export.add($obj.get('document'), 0)) #end ### PERFORM ### $export.export() #end {{/velocity}}

property.description: This application allows to export multiple pages into a single XAR archive file, and to save the list of the pages that you want to export.

xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #### Controller ##### #if("$!request.action" == "") #view() #elseif("$!request.action" == "ajaxsuggest") #ajaxsuggest() #end
#### AJAX SUGGEST #### #macro(ajaxsuggest) #set($input = $request.get('input').toLowerCase()) #set($hql = "where lower(doc.fullName) like ?") #set($discard = $response.setContentType("text/xml")) <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <results> #foreach($r in $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql, ["%$input%"])) <rs>$r</rs> #end </results> #end
#### VIEW ### #macro(view) = Description =
This application allows to export multiple pages into a single XAR archive file, and to save the list of the pages that you want to export.
= Usage = Create a new page, where the list of pages to export will be saved. Then, just write: {{code language="velocity}} {{savedlistexportapp /}} {{/code}}
You will have the following application : (% style="text-align:center;" %) [[image:ExportApp-1.png]]
But of course, the list will be empty at the first usage.
You can have different lists, just by creating a new page and using this macro.
= Installations = Don't forget to add {{code}}Macros.SavedListExporterApplicationTranslations{{/code}} to your translations pages.
= About = * [[Extension page>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/SavedListExporterApplication]]
#end {{/velocity}}
